verse.name: v1
verse.lines: I wandered in the shades of night, Till Jesus came to me, And with the sunlight of His love Bid all my darkness flee.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Sunlight, sunlight in my soul today, Sunlight, sunlight all along the way; Since the Savior found me Took away my sin, I have had the sunlight of His love within.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Tho' clouds may gather in the sky, And billows round me roll, However dark the world may be, I've sunlight in my soul.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: While walking in the light of God, I sweet communion find; I press with holy vigor on, And leave the world behind.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I cross the wide-extended fields, I journey o'er the plain, And in the sunlight of His love I reap the golden grain.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Soon I shall see Him as He is, The light that came to me, Behold the brightness of His face, Thro'out eternity.
